title: ariyinba nAmam
sahitya:
ariyinba nAmam aDiyEnukkEmam adai nALum kUri aDaivEnar bOdham


anupallavi

  tirai vAriyamudam tarum AyuL onrE tirunAma amudO tarum anda vIDE


caraNam    karu vaNNamAlE tiru ninra mArbh gati nalgum ayyA karikUva vandOi 
taruvenra kaiyyA aruLginra meyyA tanusangam Azhi punai tUngavennum
